sentences.english: Work is the grand cure of all the maladies and miseries that ever beset mankind.
sentences.chinese: 工作是医治人间一切病痛和疾苦的万应良药。

sentences.english: With rest thorough communication, understanding rest hardship and innermost feelings idea.
sentences.chinese: 和息者深入沟通，了解息者的疾苦和内心想法。

sentences.english: There are, however, many ways to treat mouth sores.
sentences.chinese: 当然，有良多种医治口腔疾苦悲戚的方法。

sentences.english: He always has the well-being of the masses at heart.
sentences.chinese: 他总是把群众的疾苦挂在心上。

sentences.english: Work is the grand cure of all the maladies and miserise that ever beast mankind.(Carlyle)
sentences.chinese: 工作是医治人间一切病痛和疾苦的万应良药。

sentences.english: Many people with various mouth sores have trouble eating or swallowing.
sentences.chinese: 许多有分歧的口腔疾苦悲戚的人在吃或吞咽时有难题。

sentences.english: I fall to my knees, I cry and I cry.
sentences.chinese: 双膝跪倒的偶，疾苦流涕。

sentences.english: How can you be indifferent to the sufferings of starving people?
sentences.chinese: 你怎能对饥民的疾苦无动于衷呢？

sentences.english: He had broad knowledge and showed great sympathy with the hardship of the people.
sentences.chinese: 他怜人民之疾苦，具有渊博的学识。

sentences.english: power takes as ingratitude the writhings of its victims.
sentences.chinese: 势力认为牺牲者的疾苦是利令智昏。

sentences.english: Conversely, thoughts of monetary loss may enhance physical or psychological pain.
sentences.chinese: 反之，破财的动机年夜概会加重人的肉体或心理疾苦。

sentences.english: Work is the grand cure of all the maladies and miseries that ever beset humankind.
sentences.chinese: 工作是医治人间一切病痛和疾苦的万应良药。

definition: to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)
lit. to rescue the people from hanging upside down (idiom, from Mencius); to save the people from dire straits
worldly affairs/the ways of the world
